name: Chess Bullet Trainer
description:
Chess Bullet Trainer

Clicker Mode

Inspired by Don't Tap, click the black tiles as fast as you can without clicking the white tiles. Try and improve your streak!

Vision Mode

Improve your visualisation of the chess board. Just click the board square indicated by the prompt. 

Precision Mode

Practice your mouse technique for online chess. You'll be presented with two pieces on the board - take the opponent's piece! 

The Vision and Precision mode can be played in three ways:

  • Freeplay: No pressure, just play.
  • Time Trial: Get 30 successful moves as quickly as possible.
  • Countdown: Get as many successful moves in 30 seconds. 

[F] Toggle fullscreen
[M] Toggle mute
[SPACE] Skip / retry
[ESC] Back

Let me know if you have any suggestions for improvements :)
